itunes:title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 2
title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 2
description: Proverbs 29:25 says, “Fear of man will prove to be a snare, but whoever trusts in the Lord is kept safe” (NIV). We cannot serve God and be constantly worried about what other people think. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches what the Bible says about how we can overcome the fear of failure and move forward in our God-given purpose.
